1. Greenlight's David Einhorn says the markets are broken and getting worse  CNBC

  5. Why investors should prepare for Trump tax cuts and immigration policy to bring inflation back  NBC Miami

item.title: Meatpacking company to pay $2M child labor penalty for alleged Minnesota violations - KARE11.com
item.description:
1. Meatpacking company to pay $2M child labor penalty for alleged Minnesota violations  KARE11.com
  2. St. James, Minn.'s Smithfield meat-processing plant the latest to face allegations of child labor  Star Tribune
  3. Smithfield meatpacking plant in St. James fined $2M for child labor violations  KSTP
  4. Minnesota company slapped with $2M penalty for illegally employing kids  Bring Me The News
  5. Smithfield agrees to pay $2 million to resolve child labor allegations at Minnesota meat plant  Yahoo Finance
